languages.text: "Напоминает один символ, что в ходу у Кровавой паутины. Как же он называется... "Песнь о дороге кровавых следов", вроде бы. Это известная в отсеке молитва, многие слышали ее из уст ткачей, когда они... хм... служили Императору тем образом, каким умеют".

traits.locale_text: "В ней зашифрована "Песнь о дороге кровавых следов". Я знаю первое четверостишие, которое культисты Кровавой паутины открыли мирянам".

languages.text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Напоминает один символ, что в ходу у Кровавой паутины. Как же он называется... "Песнь о дороге кровавых следов", вроде бы. Это известная в отсеке молитва, многие слышали ее из уст ткачей, когда они... хм... служили Императору тем образом, каким умеют".

It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

"It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."
{n}Judging by Frensoe's confused expression, this was not the reaction he was expecting.{/n}

"It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

languages.text: « On dirait l'un des symboles associés à la Toile de Sang. Comment l'appelle-t-on déjà... Ah oui, le "Chant de la piste de sang", il me semble. C'est une prière bien connue au sein de ce compartiment. On entend régulièrement les tisseurs la réciter quand ils... ahem... quand ils accomplissent leur mission particulière au service de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « On dirait l'un des symboles associés à la Toile de Sang. Comment l'appelle-t-on déjà... Ah oui, le "Chant de la piste de sang", il me semble. C'est une prière bien connue au sein de ce compartiment. On entend régulièrement les tisseurs la réciter quand ils... ahem... quand ils accomplissent leur mission particulière au service de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «Se parece a uno de los símbolos asociados a la Red Sanguinolenta. Cómo se llamaba... "La Canción del Rastro de Sangre", creo que era. Se trata de una plegaria que muchos en este compartimento conocen. Hemos oído a los tejedores recitarla cuando... esto... desempeñan sus servicios en nombre del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Se parece a uno de los símbolos asociados a la Red Sanguinolenta. Cómo se llamaba... "La Canción del Rastro de Sangre", creo que era. Se trata de una plegaria que muchos en este compartimento conocen. Hemos oído a los tejedores recitarla cuando... esto... desempeñan sus servicios en nombre del Emperador».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブに関連するシンボルの一つに似ていますね。なんと呼ばれていたか…『滴る血の歌』だったと思います。この区画に住む多くの者がよく口にする祈りです。織り手たちが…その…皇帝への奉仕として、特徴的な行為をするときに口にするのを聞いたことがあるのです」
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブに関連するシンボルの一つに似ていますね。なんと呼ばれていたか…『滴る血の歌』だったと思います。この区画に住む多くの者がよく口にする祈りです。織り手たちが…その…皇帝への奉仕として、特徴的な行為をするときに口にするのを聞いたことがあるのです」

languages.text: “这看起来有点像织血罗网的符号。那首祷文是叫什么来着……好像是叫《血路之歌》吧？这片甲板很多人都很熟悉他们的祷词。每当那些织网者……嗯……通过他们特有的手段履行对帝皇的职责时，我们就会听到他们祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “这看起来有点像织血罗网的符号。那首祷文是叫什么来着……好像是叫《血路之歌》吧？这片甲板很多人都很熟悉他们的祷词。每当那些织网者……嗯……通过他们特有的手段履行对帝皇的职责时，我们就会听到他们祈祷。”

languages.text: "Sie ähnelt einem der Symbole, die mit dem Blutgesponnenen Netz in Verbindung gebracht werden. Wie hieß es doch gleich ... 'Das Lied von der Blutspur', glaube ich. Ein Gebet, das in diesem Modul recht verbreitet ist. Spinner sprechen es, wenn sie ... na ja ... ihre Arbeit im Dienst des Imperators verrichten."
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."

Ein Gebet, das in diesem Modul recht verbreitet ist. Spinner sprechen es, wenn sie ... na ja ... ihre Arbeit im Dienst des Imperators verrichten."

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'yla ilişkilendirilen bir sembole benziyor. Neydi adı... 'Kan İzi Ezgisi' diyorlardı galiba. Kompartımandakilerin iyi bildiği bir duadır. Dokurların... Şey... Meşhur faaliyetlerini yürüterek İmparator'a hizmet ettikleri sırada bu duayı okuduğunu işitmiştik."
languages.original_text: "It resembles one of the symbols associated with the Bloodspun Web. What was it called again... 'The Song of Trailing Blood,' I think. It's a prayer familiar to many in this compartment. We've heard spinners say it when they... well... perform their signature acts of service to the Emperor."
